page.title: 02IRVINE DEVELOPMENT CORP.
page.content: { Irvine Development Corporation}was set up by the Government in 1966. The government believed that Irvine could renew itself and become a New Town. {New Towns }are set up to attract industry and people to a certain area. A Development Corporation is also in charge of the house building and house repairs and maintainance, for this they employ private contractors, surveyors, and engineers. The Government gave Irvine Development Corporation a population target of 116,000 and they must try to reach this by{1990.}The Corporation has a workforce of over 300, involved in house building, architecture,legal affairs, surveying etc. The Corporation has so far received over 15 awards for design, in a wide variety of developments.
